content:
I'm trying to use xmllint to validate our XMLs command line.

Getting CDA.xsd from HL7.org, this worked:
xmllint --noout --schema CDA.xsd hartTest.xml
hartTest.xml validates

Grabbing the schematron files from here though for CCDA 2.1 (I assume this is what the CDA Scorecard is effectively using/doing):
https://github.com/HL7/cda-ccda-2.1

I am getting a slew of "Schemas parser error" doing:
xmllint --noout --schematron Consolidation.sch hartTest.xml
ie...
/Users/dcarlson/Downloads/Consolidation.sch:13: element phase: Schemas parser error : Expecting a pattern element instead of phase

Does anyone happen to know what I'm doing wrong there? I assume that is a valid Consolidation.sch file (updated 7 months ago).

Thanks for any feedback.
Dave Carlson (MIE) has marked this topic as resolved.
